description: Key Features of Nitro Classic (now discontinued):  Global Emojis: Use custom emojis from any server you belong to, anywhere you can use emojis.  Upgraded Go-Live Streaming: Stream in 1080p at 60 FPS.  Custom Discord Tag: Change your four-digit number after your username.  Increased Upload Limit: Share files up to 50MB.  Boost Discount: 30% off server boosts.
